generated_description:
### Frubana Inc: Your One-Stop Shop for Latin American Restaurants

Founded in 2018 and hailing from the vibrant city of São Paulo, Brazil, Frubana Inc is on a mission to be "the everything store for restaurants in LATAM." The company has made a name for itself as a game-changer for the restaurant industry in Latin America, and it's part of Y Combinator's Batch W19, which adds a layer of credibility to its startup credentials.

With a dedicated team of 384 employees, Frubana operates in the intersection of fintech, B2B services, and logistics. This unique blend of sectors allows them to create streamlined solutions that cater to the myriad needs of restaurants—making it easier for them to source ingredients, supplies, and other essential items all from one platform.

What really sets Frubana apart is its user-friendly website, [frubana.com](https://www.frubana.com), that engages users with an easy selection process for different cities—whether you’re in Campinas, São Paulo, Belo Horizonte, or Curitiba. Their approach focuses on offering convenience and efficiency, ensuring that restaurants can focus on what they do best: serving great food.

Frubana is not just looking to build a marketplace; they’re creating a community. They actively invite potential suppliers and job seekers to join their growing platform, recognizing that their ecosystem is only as strong as the partnerships they forge.

In summary, Frubana Inc is more than just a logistics company; it's a pivotal resource for restaurants across Latin America, combining technology and industry expertise to forge a path for an innovative future in dining. If you're in the restaurant business in LATAM, Frubana is definitely worth keeping on your radar.
